name: Glutonny
description:
Glutonny for Ludum Dare #40

You control blue spirit with keyboard arrow. 

First time ludum dare.  First experience and lot of fun time. I started to writte my first code in lua in October to say "hello world". Challenge this time was to make something that work. 

Hope You will enjoy it and dont hesitate to comment. 

Crock Nys
